item.title: Getting started with ravendb
item.description: Installation or Setup # Detailed instructions on getting ravendb set up or installed. A simple RavenDB console application # For this example we will use the Live Test RavenDB instance. We will build a simple console app here which demonstrates the most basic operations: Creation Retrieval by Id Querying Updating Deletion Begin by creating a new Visual Studio solution and add a Console Application project to it. Let’s call it RavenDBDemoConsole.
